options.name: Medical Expertise
options.description: Your medical knowledge extends beyond basic healing. Gain +1 skill with medicine. You can grant an ally +2 temporary hit points during a short rest that lasts until their next rest.

options.name: Action : Emergency Surgery
options.description: Perform emergency treatment on an adjacent ally. Make a medicine check (DC 8). Success: Remove one physical condition and heal 2 health. Failure: They take 1 damage from rough treatment.

options.name: Reaction : Preventive Care
options.description: When an adjacent ally would gain a physical condition, make a medicine check (DC equals the effect's DC). On success, prevent the condition.

options.name: Anatomical Knowledge
options.description: Your medical training helps you spot vulnerabilities. Gain +1 skill with senses. When you successfully treat an ally, you can identify any hidden injuries or conditions affecting them.

options.name: Combat Medic
options.description: You remain effective under pressure. Gain +1 skill with endurance. You can use medicine checks in combat without penalty and gain +2 physical mitigation while treating an ally.

options.name: Herbalist
options.description: You can create healing remedies from nature. Gain +1 skill with wildcraft. Spend 10 minutes to create a poultice that heals 3 health when applied (limit 3 per day).

options.name: Action : Resuscitate
options.description: Attempt to revive an ally who fell to 0 health within the last 2 rounds. Make a medicine check (DC 12). Success: They return to consciousness with 1 health and are weakened for 1 hour. Once per ally per day.

options.name: Master Surgeon
options.description: Your medical treatments are exceptionally effective. Gain +1 skill with medicine. Healing you provide is increased by 2, and you can cure permanent injuries with a week of treatment (DC 15 medicine check).

options.name: Plague Doctor
options.description: You are immune to diseases and poisons. Gain +1 skill with resilience and immunity to non-magical diseases and poisons. You can create antidotes that grant others temporary immunity (1 hour).

options.name: Miracle Worker
options.description: Your medical abilities approach the miraculous. Gain +1 skill with medicine and +1 skill with endurance. Once per day, perform a 1-minute miracle: remove all conditions from one ally, heal them for 10 health, grant immunity to physical conditions for 1 hour, and remove permanent injuries if at 0 health.
